title: Client Lib Generator
description: This generator creates a new client library. It is used to create shared libraries, platform libraries, and admin libraries.

name.description: Name of the library. It should be a valid npm package name.
name.x-prompt: What project name would you like to use? (It must start with 'ngn-' prefix)

type.description: Client library type in: features, platform, shared

x-prompt.message: Which type of library would you like to generate?

items.label: ✴️ shared/ui           [Shared UI libs, e.g. ngn-ui-x. Can be used in platform or admin apps. Sharing level 1.]
✴️ shared/util         [Shared util libs, e.g. ngn-x-utils. Can be used in platform or admin apps. Sharing level 1.]
✴️ features            [Shared general libs, e.g. ngn-monaco-editor. Can be used in platform or admin apps. Sharing level 2.]
✴️ platform/features   [Platform specific feature libs, e.g. ngn-flame-board-view. Can be used in platform apps. Sharing level 3.]
✴️ platform/shared     [Platform specific shared libs, e.g. <to be filled>. Share level 3.]
... Admin specific libs, e.g. ngn-admin-ui. Can be used in admin apps. Share level 3. ...
